name: Learn Dutch With Amy for Kids

google.title: Learn Dutch With Amy for Kids
google.description: Learn Dutch with fun games for kids! Children playfully learn over 180 new words at their own pace. Parents and caregivers get insight into their educational progress in the results overview. Try 3 themes for free! How can Learn Dutch With Amy help your kids? ‚Ä¢ Learn and play: challenging games (slideshow, concentration game, puzzle, and quiz). ‚Ä¢ Learn step by step: words are ordered into clear categories (Farm, Clothing, Colors, Transportation, Numbers, Shapes, Playground, Food & drinks, Zoo, Home, Body, Music, and Sports). ‚Ä¢ High-quality graphics designed by professionals. ‚Ä¢ Words are spoken by a voice over professional with a friendly female voice. ‚Ä¢ Teaches pronunciation and spelling. ‚Ä¢ Helps children learn new words they do not know yet (expanding your child's vocabulary). Listening and reading skills of children are measured by the app, and can be viewed by parents and supervisors. The results can be viewed for a limited time only. An in-app purchase allows you to view the results of the last two weeks, and allows filtering by category and skill. Learn Dutch With Amy offers several fun and interactive preschooler games that teach kids in the following areas: FARM: match cute animals from ducks to cows and learn how these words look, sound, and how to write and pronounce them correctly before kindergarten. Words: tractor, koe, kip, paard, kat, hond, eend, geit, and 5 more! CLOTHING: what do we put on today and how do you pronounce that in Dutch? Words: muts, laars, want, schoen, broek, jurk, bloes, riem, and 8 more! COLORS: your child will learn the most common colors as easy as 123. Words: zwart, bruin, rood, donkergroen, grijs, lichtblauw, lichtgroen, oranje, and 5 more! TRANSPORTATION: see and learn the different means of transportation on the road, in the water or in the sky! Words: auto, trein, vrachtwagen, vliegtuig, fiets, bus, helikopter, motor, and 5 more! NUMBERS: learning the basics of the 123s is vital for toddlers and preschool aged kids and will help later with kindergarten math. Words: nul, een, twee, drie, vier, vijf, zes, zeven, and 3 more! SHAPES: your preschooler will get to know the basic shapes by learning cute and colorful rectangles, circles, triangles, etc. Words: pijl, cirkel, hart, ovaal, rechthoek, ring, spiraal, vierkant, and 2 more! PLAYGROUND: learn how to pronounce and write the equipment of the playground in Dutch. Words: draaimolen, rekstok, klimrek, ringen, zandbak, wip, glijbaan, wipkip, and 4 more! FOOD & DRINKS: learn how to pronounce and write the names of different food and drink items from around the world and tell everyone about them! Words: appel, banaan, brood, wortel, kaas, ei, vis, vork, and 15 more! ZOO: look at the zoo animals and learn how they are written and pronounced in Dutch. Words: papegaai, leeuw, aap, zebra, olifant, giraffe, kameel, krokodil, and 8 more! HOME: apart from learning the basic shapes of everyday home appliances, your preschooler will hear the names along with their pronunciations. Words: stoel, deur, telefoon, plant, douche, trap, tafel, toilet, and 3 more! And 3 more categories! The following categories are available for free: Food & drinks, Zoo, and Body. Remaining categories are available as an in-app purchase. New games and categories regularly become available. Kindergartens use this game to decrease language delays for newcomers. Teachkidslanguages.com is a startup that aims to improve the way young children learn languages. Do you have questions or feedback? We love to hear from you! Please contact us at info@teachkidslanguages.com Visit us! https://www.teachkidslanguages.com Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/TeachKidsLanguages Follow us! https://twitter.com/TeachKidsLang Like us? If yes, please give us a review!

Complete app met uren aan speelplezier. Wat het gebruiksgemak behoorlijk bemoeilijkt is dat de zijbalk met de terug-knop niet verdwijnt (Android) en mijn dochtertje daar regelmatig met haar vinger op komt. Hierdoor wordt haar spelletje heel vaak Ongewenst onderbroken. Wellicht kan dat met een update verholpen worden?
